I have read in newsgroups that there is a sensitivity analysis within
cantera --- which version has this and maybe what is the fundamental
routine?  
Related to this, is there a way to get the time-step jacobian matrix. I
don't really care how deep in the solver this may be.  I would just like
some hints.

any hints?

Edward S. Blurock
Lund University
